hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Market#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #7# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ GS Wind Hint Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Child Recovery Heart 2

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ Before Spinning Log Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #Damp√©'s Grave#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Ganondorf doesn't specialize in hiding items, nor in keeping secrets for that matter.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that if you don't use your slingshot at all when you play the slingshot minigame, the owner gets upset with you.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Dead Hand surrounded by Bomb Flowers# guards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Bomb Flower Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Biggoron Sword#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #3# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Biggoron Sword#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Purple Rupee#.
